channel.title: My flash games website, constructive critasism please :)
channel.description:
hiya guys,
Well ive spent a while putting this site together and now ive got to a point where im not too sure what to do next. I currently have around 150 hosted games but id like to exspand it but im not sure how. I would appreciate if anyone could just take a looky and tell me what they would like to see / improved.
link - http://www.munkysarcade.com/
Good news! the site now has a blog! please go on a psot some constructive critasism and idea's!
link - http://munkysarcade.awardspace.com/blog/
thx,
thx babe for allowing me to post,
solemn.

item.title: My flash games website, constructive critasism please :)
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I think you should make the embedded game bigger, because the games look a little small, and with my eyes I find them hard to read.

most of the current games i have only run at that resolution without looky blury and pixelated.

Good news! the site now has a blog! please go on a psot some constructive critasism and idea’s!

link - http://munkysarcade.awardspace.com/blog/

thx,

solemnn.

Read full topic
